element.name: Humblewood Campaign Setting
element.description:
In the world of Everden lies a mystical forest known as Humblewood. The fires have come, and Humblewood has been thrown into chaos.

In this exciting campaign setting for fifth edition D&D, you and your party take on the role of forest creatures like birds, raccoons, mice, and hedgehogs in order to save your home from a fiery threat.
